application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: To carry out all works recommended in health & safety survey. T024 - Norway Maple - Lift canopy away from garage roof to ensure 1m min. clearance.G008.1 - Sycamore - Fell to ground level, remove wood responsibly. Stump grind stump only to minimise spread of fungus.T070 - Field maple - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over road and driveway to prevent obstruction or contact damage.T071 - Field maple - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over road and driveway to prevent obstruction or contact damage.T072 - Field maple - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over road and driveway to prevent obstruction or contact damage.T073 - Field maple - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over road and driveway to prevent obstruction or contact damage.T074 - Field maple - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over road and driveway to prevent obstruction or contact damage.T078 - Silver birch - Tip lift (where possible) low canopy to 3m agl over the road.G002.2 - Scots pine - Fell to 1m agl. T079 - Ash - Remove deadwood and branches dying back in the upper canopy to create more compact upper canopy. T084 - Lime - Lift low canopy to 2.5m agl over footpath/ or back to footpath edge and 3.5m agl over the road. Prune back from lamp column toensure clearance under the lamp and 0.5m above.T087 - Oak - Tip lift low canopy to 3.5m over the road only.T088 - Lime - Reduce extended upper canopy by up to 3.5m and shaping reduction into 3/4 height canopy. G007 - Walnut, Elder, Sycamore - Fell dead elder to ground level. Prune low walnut limb to near road edge to tip lift.T091 - Sycamore - Heavily reduce to approx 3m (1m above 1st union) to reduce risk of failure and retain some standing deadwood habitat.Chipbranches and neatly stack larger wood.G001 - Cypress x7, Holm oak, Holly x5 - Lift growth to 2.5m agl over footpath and 3.5m agl over the road.T085 - Sweet chestnut - Lift or cut back lower canopy growth to 3.5m agl or road edge on the road side only.T088 - Lime - Careful removal of bas...
